summary: A quick, and amateurish, mod i whipped up that replaces one of the stock warpaints with a slightly more stylish pattern...
descriptionHtml:
A quick, and amateurish, mod i whipped up that replaces one of the stock warpaints with a slightly more stylish pattern...

This mod will replace one warpaint for Imperiel, Nord and Redguard males and females.  This lightning bolt warpaint pattern is similar to that seen on the iconic David Bowie album cover Aladdin Sane.

This is yet another example proving my long standing theory that David Bowie makes everything better!

You may use this for whatever, as long as it\'s awesome.  If you make a better version let me know so I can download your\'s instead of using mine!!



Thanks to:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii[/url] for the awesome hair.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]LodRaam[/url] for the great eye textures (how about a David Bowie preset, hint hint).
 
And especially:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7536]serfernet2[/url] who\'s file structure I copied so as not to extract the Skyrim Data BSA to find out where the warpaint textures were hidden ;)
author: dubstyles
